reviewText: What a SWEET film. The film was made in New Zealand, and has a few familiar faces you might not be able to attach a name to,except Hayley Mills... if you're MY age. No objectionable material, but SOME people with hearing defects would probably preferCLOSED CAPTIONING or SUBTITLES to help out with the "British" accents.The little fellow that played Eli was wonderful.I commend all of the reviewers for NOT spoiling any twists 'n' turns in the movie. I'm a seasoned combat veteran, but, the filmmade me "misty", occasionally, as others stated. Excellent little "indie" film!Life is TOO short to miss quality surprises such as THIS.
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: The movie was excellent, good for families, any age. It is a very clean and very thoughtful movie. I like the way it portrays our Lord and Savior, always concern by the needs of others. Forgiven, helpful,talking and sharing your pain. It was an excellent family movie.The little boy was very astute.
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: This is a good "family time, touching heartwarming" movie, with a good bit of humor thrown in. For those of you who, like me, feel the typical Hallmark movie is becoming a bit cliched and boring, this is a welcome change. The atmosphere makes it a fun movie that breaks out of the standard family movie. Ioan Gruffudd's great acting paired with a pretty brilliant child actor also keep it exciting. It doesn't disappoint, and I'd recommend it to anyone.
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: This movie is just one-of-a-kind.  My sons weren't quite sure at the beginning and were glued to the screen at the end.  I can't wait to watch it again with my daughters and hubby.  (That is saying something, as I rarely take an extra two hours out of my life to watch a movie twice.)  It is sweet, thought-provoking and just beautiful to look at.  Excellent acting by the entire cast.  I wish there more movies made like this one.
summary: Oh my goodness - what a wonderfully poignant movie
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: A nice break from the usual fare. Even if a bit sentimental, still a very nice film. Especially for the family.
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: One of the best feel good inspirational films I've seen.  It leaves you with a wonderful message and a smile on your face.
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: I thought it was fabulous... I loved watching the parents he pick learn how to have a child again after the loss of their own.  It was a great movie of healing and moving on yet preserving the love they had for their own lost son while learning to give this little boy love as well.  I won't give away the ending for you, but it was a touching one.
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: Nice movie.  Not quite as good as I expected but it is entertaining with a decent story line. Thank you.
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: Good acting, good plot, it was new.  I just like the entire story.  Thank you, it made for a great evening.
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: very sweet story line. I like the actors in this dvd, good clean entertainment :-)
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: Cute, Christian, family friendly movie. I watched it knowing it would be a happy, formula ending story about a childless family that needed a miracle.  I wanted a happy ending and I got it.  If you want a happy ending, Traditional Christian story about angles and healing then you will probably love this.
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: I wasn't sure from the title and description if this movie would be good or not, but gave it a try. It was surprisingly very, very good! I think had it been American actors, it would not have been as good. But because they were British, it gave just enough zing to the story to make it exceptional! Very sweet movie! (A little bit of a tear-jerker...but with a happy ending!)
Title: Angel in the House

reviewText: One of the best movies we've seen in a while.  Subject matter is very uplifting for the young and old.  A gentle story how life really can really work for us down here.  Recommend this DVD for all ages.
Title: Angel in the House
